content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be perfect for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the offer. I'm looking for a comfortable and affordable place to live, and I believe your apartment could be a great fit. What is the lowest price you can offer for this wonderful apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I can start with €1000 per month. It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll find it worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Mister Schmidt. However, I must negotiate for a lower price. Could you consider €950 per month? This would be more in line with my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but I can't go that low. The apartment is in the city center and has all the amenities. I think €1000 is a fair price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. The location and amenities are indeed attractive. How about €975? This is a balanced offer that reflects the quality of the apartment while taking into account my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [975] Euro! Let's make this deal official.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Mister Schmidt. The apartment will be perfect for my needs. Thank you for your time and for offering me such a wonderful place to live. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
